mapper.select: select count(*) as count from member

select id as id, name as name, pw as pw, phone as phone, address as address, license_type as licenseType, license_num as licenseNum, license_end as licenseEnd, license_start as licenseStart, birth as birth, gender as gender, email as email from member

select id as id, name as name, pw as pw, phone as phone, address as address, license_type as licenseType, license_num as licenseNum, license_end as licenseEnd, license_start as licenseStart, birth as birth, gender as gender, email as email from member where ${keyField} = #{keyword}
